entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 09:38 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
